Module Library
Package com.cestar.model

Class Books

java.lang.Object
com.cestar.model.Books
public class Books extends Object
The Book class represents a book entity with various properties such as ID, name, author, category, publisher, and price. It provides methods to access and manipulate these properties.
Since:
2024-04-06
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jhansi Saranu , Sunitha Thota , Venkata Mani Krishna Lam , Sree Harsha Guntamadugu
